Origin
2/21
  • Late 80s, Sun realized Microsoft owned the desktop
  • 1991: Project Green
    • Led by James Gosling and Patrick Naughton
    • Consumer electronics applications devices e.g. TV set-top boxes
    • Requirements: small, reliable, availability, platform independence
    • Based on UCSD Pascal: intermediate code for virtual machine
    • Language called Oak
  • 1993-1994: First Person company: no funding found
  • 1995: HotJava browser with applets
  • 1996: Netscape 2.0 with applets: breakthrough
What is Java ?
